text: Mopatop's Shop was a British animated television series that aired from 1999 to 2003 and becoming as a segment on CITV's Telly Tots for the last four seasons. ==Broadcast History== Country Network Australia ABC Kids (2002 - February 28, 2008) Croatia Djeƒçja Televizija (unknown) Israel Hop! Channel (2000s) Israeli Educational Television (2000s) Netherlands Kindernet (January 6, 2001 - July 10, 2003) Serbia Ultra (unknown) United Kingdom ITV (CITV) (January 4, 1999 - 2009) == References == Category:2000s British comedy television series Category:Television sketch shows Category:1999 British television series debuts Category:2003 British television series endings Category:British animated television series
title: Mopatop's Shop
